name: Aspect Energy Capacity
description: The energy used by your build to activate fragments.

name: Handicap
description: Handicap

name: Void Cost
description: Void Armor Mod

name: Velocity
description: Increases the speed of projectiles fired by this weapon.

name: Recoil Direction
description: The weapon's tendency to move while firing.

name: Score Multiplier
description: Amount by which the current handicap is increasing score values.

name: Guard Efficiency
description: Reduces the amount of energy required to guard an attack.

name: Swing Speed
description: The speed at which you can launch attacks.

name: Charge Time
description: The time in milliseconds before a weapon fires.

name: Mobility
description: Increases your movement speed and maximum jump height.

name: Boost
description: How much speed can be gained from boosting.

name: Charge Rate
description: How fast this weapon recharges its energy.

name: Power Bonus
description: The Seasonal Artifact increases your Power, increasing the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

name: Solar Cost
description: Solar Armor Mod

name: Zoom
description: How much the weapon's scope can zoom in on targets.

name: Any Energy Type Cost
description: Any Energy Type

name: Precision Damage
description: Damage when striking a target's weak points.

name: Blast Radius
description: Increases the explosion radius of this weapon.

name: Arc Energy Capacity
description: This armor cannot accept mods that require Void or Solar energy.

name: Guard Endurance
description: How long you can maintain your guard with this weapon.

name: Arc Cost
description: Arc Armor Mod

name: Magazine
description: The number of shots which can be fired before reloading.

name: Defense
description: Reduces incoming damage from your enemies.

name: Move Speed
description: Speed while carrying the weapon.

name: Stasis Cost
description: Stasis Armor Mod

name: Time to Aim Down Sights
description: Speed while aiming down the sights.

name: Impact
description: Increases the damage inflicted by each round.

name: Reload Speed
description: The time it takes to reload this weapon.

name: Strength
description: Strength decreases the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

name: Rounds Per Minute
description: The number of shots per minute this weapon can fire.

name: Void Energy Capacity
description: This armor cannot accept mods that require Arc or Solar energy.

name: Fragment Cost
description: The energy used by your build to activate fragments.

name: Intellect
description: Intellect decreases the cooldown of your Super ability, allowing you to use it more often.

name: Stability
description: How much or little recoil you will experience while firing the weapon.

name: Guard Resistance
description: Damage reduction while guarding with this weapon against most attacks.

name: Ghost Energy Capacity
description: This Ghost can accept any Ghost mods.

name: Durability
description: Higher Durability allows your vehicle to take more damage before failing.

name: Resilience
description: Increases the amount of damage you can take before dying.

name: Draw Time
description: The time in milliseconds it takes to draw an arrow. Release an arrow when fully drawn for maximum damage and speed.

name: Mod Cost
description: This Ghost can accept any Ghost mods.

name: Ammo Capacity
description: How many powerful attacks this weapon can launch before ammo is depleted

name: Handling
description: The speed with which the weapon can be readied and aimed.

name: Stasis Cost
description: Stasis Armor Mod

name: Range
description: Increases the effective range of this weapon.

name: Aim Assistance
description: The weapon's ability to augment your aim.

name: Attack
description: Higher Attack allows your weapons to damage higher-level opponents.

name: Speed
description: How fast this vehicle travels over land.

name: Heroic Resistance
description: Provides additional damage resistance while your Super is active.

name: Arc Damage Resistance
description: Reduces all incoming damage while your Super is active. Reduces incoming Arc damage from non-Guardian enemies.

name: Solar Damage Resistance
description: Reduces all incoming damage while your Super is active. Reduces incoming Solar damage from non-Guardian enemies.

name: Void Damage Resistance
description: Reduces all incoming damage while your Super is active. Reduces incoming Void damage from non-Guardian enemies.

name: Accuracy
description: How well shots fired by this weapon hit their target.

name: Discipline
description: Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

name: Inventory Size
description: How much ammo a player can hold in reserve.

name: Power
description: Raising your Power increases the damage your abilities deal against higher-level enemies.

name: Recovery
description: Increases the speed at which you regain lost health.

name: Solar Energy Capacity
description: This armor cannot accept mods that require Void or Arc energy.
